channel.title: Finances on WETHOD / Learning Center
channel.description: Recent content in Finances on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Finance
item.description: Orders In this section you can see all your orders and create new ones. After creating an order you can send it and confirm it. Once you click on the “Send” button, an e-mail is sent to the address provided in the Email Bot section. After confiming an order you will not be able to edit it again. To create an order: Click on the top left “+ order” button and an empty order will be added to the list; Compile the required fields; Click on the “create” button.
